text: Algernon Wilkinson (21 January 1894 – 1967) was an English professional footballer who played as a goalkeeper. ==Career== Born in Greasbrough, Wilkinson signed for Bradford City from Rotherham County in May 1919.Frost, p. 410 He made 12 league and 5 FA Cup appearances for the club,Frost, p. 390 before joining Liverpool in January 1923. He later played for Blackpool, Mold Town, Wrexham, Flint Town and Little Sutton Victoria. ==Sources== * ==References== Category:1894 births Category:1967 deaths Category:Date of death missing Category:English footballers Category:Rotherham County F.C. players Category:Bradford City A.F.C. players Category:Liverpool F.C. players Category:Blackpool F.C. players Category:Wrexham A.F.C. players Category:Flint Town United F.C. players Category:English Football League players Category:Association football goalkeepers
title: Algernon Wilkinson
